statements: SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, nationality, biometric_data FROM biometric_identification_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name, nationality, biometric_data, user_id FROM biometric_identification_data;
SELECT last_name, user_id, nationality, biometric_data, first_name FROM biometric_identification_data;
SELECT user_id, first_name, nationality FROM biometric_identification_data;
SELECT * FROM biometric_identification_data;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM biometric_identification_data WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM biometric_identification_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM biometric_identification_data WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, nationality FROM biometric_identification_data WHERE nationality IN ('USA', 'UK');
SELECT * FROM biometric_identification_data ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT biometric_template FROM biometric_data WHERE country_code = 'USA' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, country_code FROM biometric_data WHERE id <= 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT sender_user_id, receiver_user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE country_code = 'USA';
SELECT id, user_id FROM biometric_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sender_user_id) FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, iris_scan_data FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transaction_history WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_info WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT country_name FROM countries WHERE country_code='US';
SELECT user_id, amount, currency_code FROM payments WHERE payment_status='success';
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT country_name FROM countries WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency_code FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'SUCCESS';
SELECT * FROM biometric_identifications;
SELECT user_id, biometric_data FROM biometric_identifications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT country_code, country_name FROM countries ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE verification_status = TRUE ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT biometric_data FROM biometric_identifications WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT country_name AS country, method_type AS payment_method FROM countries JOIN payment_methods ON countries.country_code = payment_methods.method_id;
